languages.text:
"Жаль, не успел ты спасти своих братьев,
Ульфар, что зовется Пропащим".

'A shame it is
that you came not in time
to save your brothers, Ulfar,
who is called Everlost.'
languages.original_text:
"Жаль, не успел ты спасти своих братьев,
Ульфар, что зовется Пропащим".

traits.locale_text:
'A shame it is
that you came not in time
to save your brothers, Ulfar,
who is called Everlost.'

'A shame it is
that you came not in time
to save your brothers, Ulfar,
who is called Everlost.'

"Жаль, не успел ты спасти своих братьев,
Ульфар, что зовется Пропащим".

'A shame it is
that you came not in time
to save your brothers, Ulfar,
who is called Everlost.'

languages.text:
「エバーロストと呼ばれる
ウルファーよ
兄弟の救出に間に合わなかったのは
実に残念だ」
languages.original_text:
'A shame it is
that you came not in time
to save your brothers, Ulfar,
who is called Everlost.'

traits.locale_text:
「エバーロストと呼ばれる
ウルファーよ
兄弟の救出に間に合わなかったのは
実に残念だ」

languages.text:
“多么可惜，
‘迷途之人’乌尔法。
你没有及时赶到，
救下你的兄弟们。”
languages.original_text:
'A shame it is
that you came not in time
to save your brothers, Ulfar,
who is called Everlost.'

traits.locale_text:
“多么可惜，
‘迷途之人’乌尔法。
你没有及时赶到，
救下你的兄弟们。”

languages.text:
« "Il est fort regrettable
qu'à temps vous ne soyez venu
pour secourir vos frères, Ulfar,
vous que l'on nomme l'Égaré." »
languages.original_text:
'A shame it is
that you came not in time
to save your brothers, Ulfar,
who is called Everlost.'

traits.locale_text:
« "Il est fort regrettable
qu'à temps vous ne soyez venu
pour secourir vos frères, Ulfar,
vous que l'on nomme l'Égaré." »

languages.text:
"Es una lástima
que no llegaras rápido
para salvar a tus hermanos, Ulfar,
conocido como el Perdido".
languages.original_text:
'A shame it is
that you came not in time
to save your brothers, Ulfar,
who is called Everlost.'

traits.locale_text:
"Es una lástima
que no llegaras rápido
para salvar a tus hermanos, Ulfar,
conocido como el Perdido".

languages.text:
'Ein Jammer,
dass Ihr nicht rechtzeitig kamt,
um Eure Brüder zu retten, Ulfar,
der Ihr Siegtnie heißt.'
languages.original_text:
'A shame it is
that you came not in time
to save your brothers, Ulfar,
who is called Everlost.'

traits.locale_text:
'Ein Jammer,
dass Ihr nicht rechtzeitig kamt,
um Eure Brüder zu retten, Ulfar,
der Ihr Siegtnie heißt.'

languages.text:
'Ne yazık ki
Kardeşlerini kurtarmaya
Zamanında yetişemedin Ulfar.
Hepgaip diye boşuna dememişler.'
languages.original_text:
'A shame it is
that you came not in time
to save your brothers, Ulfar,
who is called Everlost.'

traits.locale_text:
'Ne yazık ki
zamanında gelemedin
kardeşlerini kurtarmaya Ulfar
adı üzerinde, Hepgaip.'
